name: Sky Rider (ITheLivingMemeI)
description:
"A very precious artifact within a tribe called "Sky Riders", an ethnic group that lived between some strange platforms that fly over the earth and are in the skies has been lost by a collision between a floating island and the island where this tribe lives .

It is here where our protagonist comes into action, going in search of that lost artifact, jumping between platforms and going through portals to find the lost artifact".

This is my very fist prototype of a decent game i made in Construct 2, with sprites made by https://aamatniekss.itch.io, many thanks for the visual resources.
